titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to expand the earned income tax credit for individuals with no qualifying children.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/13/2002--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the credit percentage, earned income amount, and the phaseout amount for the earned income credit for individuals with no qualifying children.
